rukus.text: Nkͻmhyεni, ka kyerε woyerenom, ne womma mmaa, ne agyidiefoͻ maa no sε: Wͻ’mfa wͻn akatasoͻ no nkata wͻn ho so nyinaa. Saa na εyε sεdeε yεbehu wͻn, na (obi) nnha wͻn. Nyankopͻn ne Bͻnefakyε Hene, Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene

Sε nkͻnkͻnsafoͻ no, ne wͻn a yadeε wͻ wͻn akoma mu no, ne wͻn a wͻ’di nsekuro no a wͻn wͻ Madina no anyae (wͻn suban bͻne no) a, Yε’de wͻn bεhyε wonsa, na wͻ’nntumi ne wo mmͻ afipam wͻ (kuro no) mu gyesε (berε) tiaa bi
Ya’dome wͻn; baabiara a yεnsa bεka wͻn no yεbεkye wͻn aku wͻn kum paa
Nyankopͻn kwan a εda hͻ wͻ wͻn a wͻ’adikan atwa mu kͻ no ho ne no; na wonhunu nsakraeε wͻ kwan a Nyankopͻn atwa ato hͻ no mu
Nnipa no rebisa wo Dͻnhwere no ho asεm. Ka sε: “Ɛho nimdeε no deε Nyankopͻn nko ara hͻ na εwͻ”. Na deεn na εbεkyerε wo sε ebia Dͻnhwere no abεn
Nokorε sε Nyankopͻn adome boniayεfoͻ no, na Wasiesie Ogya tanaa ato hͻ ama wͻn
Emu na wͻ’bεtena afe bͻͻ, na wͻ’nnya okyitaafoͻ anaa ͻboafoͻ (biara)
Ԑda a yεbԑdane wͻn anim abutu egya no mu no, wͻ’bεka sε: “Sε yehunui a anka yεyεε sotie maa Nyankopͻn san yεε sotie maa Ͻsomafoͻ no”
Wͻ’bεka sε: “Ye’Wura Nyankopͻn, yedii yεn nhemfo ne yεn mpanimfoͻ nom akyi εna wͻ’yeraa yεn frii kwan (tenenee) no soͻ”
Ye’Wura Nyankopͻn, (yεsrε Wo sε): “Ma wͻn asotwee no mmͻho mmienu, na fa nnomee a εsoo paa dome wͻn.”
